Pre-Game Insights: Orlando finished 47-35 overall a season ago while going 29-12 at home.
Orlando averaged 110.5 points per game last season, 51.8 in the paint, 18.6 off of turnovers and 12.4 on fast breaks.
New Orleans went 49-33 overall a season ago while going 28-14 on the road.
New Orleans averaged 115.1 points per game while allowing opponents to score 110.7 last season.
Magic: Paolo Banchero: out (abdomen), Wendell Carter Jr.: out (foot).
